https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: King of Dragon Pass: Hard and Long
LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: The Sad Tale of Clan Cybrixia
column7:
I nearly lost this video; in a very rare turn of events, Camtasia Studio 7 crashed while saving the file. While I managed to recover the entire video as well as my own audio track, all of the game audio is corrupted and beyond repair. I apologize for the inconvenience. Obviously, my Windows Vista clunker - on which I recorded this video - is upset over me getting a new computer. I'll have to smother it with huggles and rainbow kisses to prevent the problem from occurring again.

There are other reasons why this is a sad tale, but I won't spoil them. Discover for yourself the rise and fall of Clan Cybrixia.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: Clan Star Zoo, 1330
column7:
I will not fucksnap... I will not fucksnap... I will not fucksnap...

Oh, we are FUCKED.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: Clan Star Zoo, 1331
LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: Clan Star Zoo, 1332
column7: Yes, ancestors count as old people. I hate them more than I hate the horse-spawn. Why? At least the horse-spawn have good reason to castrate me.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: Clan Star Zoo, 1333
column7: The old people are obviously in league with our enemies. Surely this is no cause for alarm!

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: Clan Star Zoo, 1334
column7:
Good news: We have the future Queen of Dragon Pass.
Bad news: We have to survive long enough for her to reach adulthood.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: Clan Star Zoo, 1335
column7: Clan Turtle competes for the right to be hated more than old people.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: Clan Star Zoo, 1336
column7: It was the best of times; it was the worst of times.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: Clan Star Zoo, 1337
column7: No one's better at animal "rescue" than Clan Star Zoo. Just ask Snow Cup.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: Clan Star Zoo, 1338
column7: Another eventful year for Clan Star Zoo.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: Clan Star Zoo, 1339
column7: Things aren't quite going to go the way I'd like, are they? No, no, there's no need to answer that; it was a rhetorical question. Just so long as I keep my sanity, everything will be okay.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: Clan Star Zoo, 1340
column7:
"See, the human mind is kind of like... a piñata. When it breaks open, there's a lot of surprises inside. Once you get the piñata perspective, you see that losing your mind can be a peak experience." - Jane Wagner

In other words: ARE YOU FUCKING KIDDING ME!?

I won't spoil what happens, but let's just say I got so distracted, I forgot I had invested two magic points into doing a Heroquest this year.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: Clan Star Zoo, 1341
column7: If you thought the game would celebrate my return by being lenient on me, then... well, you haven't been paying attention, but you still might be right. I reckon it's a matter of opinion.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: Clan Star Zoo, 1342
column7: I'd consider 1342 to be one of my better years directing Clan Star Zoo... were it not for the ominous events at the end which foreshadow The Epic of 1343.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: Clan Star Zoo, 1343
column7: No, I am not fucking kidding you.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL: LGWI - King of Dragon Pass: Clan Star Zoo, 1344
column7:
Shoulda-woulda-coulda. Fuck the hypotheticals. What matters is they didn't.

Hope you folks enjoyed the show. It probably didn't end the way you wanted... but, well, it didn't end the way I wanted either, so at least you're not alone. Not everyone gets to spend quality time with me, you know? Truly, you should feel honored!
